title: Alpha Client and Normal Client
body:
okay the alpha client is okay when i open it,  but when i close it and want to open the normal client it says that another league client is running i have to restart to open the normal client 
so the problem is that i closed the Alpha client but its still running ??? i don't know

replies.body: Wait like, 10-15s when you close the Alpha client, and if it still does that, open Task Manager and close all League Client process

This happens to me. What Bot Klemms said. Just go into Task Manager, and close it.

All though. Does it only do in on one version on windows or all of them? I have Windows 10, but does this problem occur on 8.1 or 7?
What Bot Klemms said. Sometimes the Operating System will still have the app process finalizing the shutdown even though visually the client appears to be closed.
Hmm... this isn't a problem with me. Maybe a Rioter can help you out on this one.
